kw.name: Get Datanode Ozone Used Bytes Info
Execute
kw.arg: export DATANODES=$(ozone admin datanode list --json) && for datanode in $(echo "$\{DATANODES\}" | jq -r '.[].id'); do ozone admin datanode usageinfo --uuid=$\{datanode\} --json | jq '{(.[0].datanodeDetails.uuid) : .[0].ozoneUsed}'; done | jq -s add

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and returns from the enclosing user keyword.

kw.name: Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: Running command 'export DATANODES=$(ozone admin datanode list --json) && for datanode in $(echo "${DATANODES}" | jq -r '.[].id'); do ozone admin datanode usageinfo --uuid=${datanode} --json | jq '{(.[0].datanodeDetails.uuid) : .[0].ozoneUsed}'; done | jq -s add 2>&1'.

kw.name: Get Datanode Ozone Used Bytes Info
Execute
kw.arg: export DATANODES=$(ozone admin datanode list --json) && for datanode in $(echo "$\{DATANODES\}" | jq -r '.[].id'); do ozone admin datanode usageinfo --uuid=$\{datanode\} --json | jq '{(.[0].datanodeDetails.uuid) : .[0].ozoneUsed}'; done | jq -s add

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and returns from the enclosing user keyword.

kw.name: Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: Running command 'export DATANODES=$(ozone admin datanode list --json) && for datanode in $(echo "${DATANODES}" | jq -r '.[].id'); do ozone admin datanode usageinfo --uuid=${datanode} --json | jq '{(.[0].datanodeDetails.uuid) : .[0].ozoneUsed}'; done | jq -s add 2>&1'.
